main event: A red, circular object was sighted at dusk in Ely, Minnesota, observed for 3-5 seconds.
interesting points: The object appeared to hover at 20 degrees on the horizon for 5 seconds., The object was observed to fly straight., The sighting duration was brief, lasting only 3-5 seconds., The evaluation suggested that the object could have been a satellite or a meteorite., The object was reported to have a transparent or gray appearance.
